content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and storage at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0)) 
-  Chest (position (42.5, -83.5)) with 30 coal
-  Burner inserter (position (43.5, -80.5)) 
-  Chest (position (44.5, -81.5)) with 30 coal
-  Chest (position (45.5, -80.5)) empty
-  Chest (position (43.5, -79.5)) with 800 coal

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure to empty the chest at the specified position to continue extracting items
### Errors when mining with burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel to continue mining
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has space in the destination chest to continue inserting items
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue inserting items
